query:
-- Finde Topic 4 ID
SELECT id, title FROM topics WHERE course_id = 2 AND title LIKE '%E-Mail%' LIMIT 1;

-- Finde Fragen in Topic 4
SELECT id, topic_id, question_text, correct_answer FROM questions WHERE topic_id = (SELECT id FROM topics WHERE course_id = 2 AND title LIKE '%E-Mail%' LIMIT 1);

-- Finde Progress für diese Frage
SELECT 
  qp.id,
  qp.question_id,
  qp.first_attempt_status,
  qp.last_attempt_correct,
  qp.attempt_count,
  q.question_text
FROM question_progress qp
JOIN questions q ON qp.question_id = q.id
WHERE qp.user_id = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'testyou@me.com')
  AND q.topic_id = (SELECT id FROM topics WHERE course_id = 2 AND title LIKE '%E-Mail%' LIMIT 1);
